infoMsg1: Hey there! If you're seeing this, it means you want to add the bot to your server. Here is the invite link!
infoMsg2: Then, you need to invite the bot! Here's an invite link. https://discord.com/

Once you've done that, do `/settings` to set up the bot. Download the template and adjust the thing.json file to your wishes, then you can upload it. After all that, use `/help` to see all the commands that the bot has for you.
infoMsg3: To-Do List: Listening to Suggestions and fixing reported bugs! Do /suggest <suggestion> if you have any suggestions or /bug <bug> if you found any bugs. Thanks.
